channel.title: Trapper [BD Killer] and Saboteur [Unseen Offensive]
channel.description:
> [color=ligblue]**The Trapper** > **BD Killer**[/color] > > **Passives:** > **Tools Of The Trade:** You are immune to all Traps. You will keep this passive if your class changes. > > **Day:** > **Rearm (2 use):** If you don't kill anyone with your trap tonight, it will not clear your lures. > > **Night:** > **Lure (inf use):** Set up lures around a player. > **Jaw Trap (inf use):** If your target visits any of your lures tonight, kill them. This will clear all lures.
---
> [color=purple]**The Saboteur** > **Unseen Offensive**[/color] > > **Passives:** > **Tools Of The Trade:** You are immune to all Traps. You will keep this passive if your class changes. > > **Day:** > **Spring Mechanism (1 use):** The trap you set tonight will also trigger the next night. > > **Night:** > **Deadfall (2 use):** Trap your target preventing them from being healed and allowing all attacks to bypass their death immunity tonight. > **Bait Trap (2 use):** Bait a player into targeting another one with your trap tonight. If Spring Mechanism forced them to visit a dead person, it will occupy them instead. ---

item.title: Trapper [BD Killer] and Saboteur [Unseen Offensive]
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
The Trapper
BD Killer

Passives:
Tools Of The Trade: You are immune to all Traps. You will keep this passive if your class changes.

Day:
Rearm (2 use): If you donâ€™t kill anyone with your trap tonight, it will not clear your lures.

Night:
Lure (inf use): Set up lures around a player.
Jaw Trap (inf use): If your target visits any of your lures tonight, kill them. This will clear all lures.

The Saboteur
Unseen Offensive

Passives:
Tools Of The Trade: You are immune to all Traps. You will keep this passive if your class changes.

Day:
Spring Mechanism (1 use): The trap you set tonight will also trigger the next night.

Night:
Deadfall (2 use): Trap your target preventing them from being healed and allowing all attacks to bypass their death immunity tonight.
Bait Trap (2 use): Bait a player into targeting another one with your trap tonight. If Spring Mechanism forced them to visit a dead person, it will occupy them instead.

Read full topic
